page.title: 16Religion,Abermorddu & Area
page.content: All the churches in the survey area, with the exception of the small Church in Wales (Anglican) Mission Church in River Lane, Cymau, are{Non-Conformist Churches with the largest proportion being those of the Presbyterian Church of Wales. Since 1967 the local Presbyterian minister, J.Curig Thomas, has had charge of six churches, including the {Welsh}language churches in Cymau and Ffrith, and the English language Bethlehem Church at Cefnybedd. Mr.Thomas feels that he is fortunate to have churches in a geographically compact area, but stills finds his job very demanding. He believes the Welsh language churches perform an important role in keeping alive Welsh in an area becoming increasingly anglicised.
